snippet.title: The Slormancer - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The Slormancer is an epic 2D Action-RPG Dungeon Crawling game following a band of outcasts on their fight against hordes of enemies lead by The Slormancer, an evil warlock making a comeback from the past to conquer the world!
Play as a Mighty Knight, a Fierce Huntress or a Mischievous Mage, master hundreds of abilities and ancestral powers, gear up, fight for the reputation of your kind and prove your value to the realm.

Featuring loads of shiny Loot, tons of collectibles, countless hours of grind, a frenetic gameplay and beautiful pixel art.


Pre-alpha footage, everything is subject to change.

The Slormancer on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1104280/The_Slormancer/

If you are interested about the game, please visit http://www.slormitestudios.com/slormancer for more informations.

If you want to support the game, check our Patreon right here: https://www.patreon.com/slormitestudios.

And if you want to follow our progress, you can find us here:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SlormiteStudios
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Slormancer/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SlormiteStudios/
Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/tkYxSuB
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/slormite_studios

Thank you for watching!

 Soundtrack by OrelusOne
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjk4W8NwdlJD_6VtFQD-Edw
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Orelus_One
